reviews.review: It's fun.

For me...The best game ever :D
You must play it!

The cake is NOT a lie!

I haven't played 2-Player yet, but the single player campaign is awesome!

Valve hat wieder ein Super Spiel auf den Tisch gelegt ,  bei dem angebot von Portal und Portal 2 für 5€ musste ich einfach zuschlagen. Aber Liebe Valve bitte unterlasse Sie nächstes mal nach jede 1-2 Minute das Laden. Es regt auf und man kommt auch Gut ohne millionen mal Laden zurecht.

Muy divertido, copado, podés divertirte con amigos, nunca te cansas, 100%+ recomendado, easter eggs muy copados, perfecto.

Very funny, nice, u can have fun with friends, u never get tired, 100%+ recommended, interesant easter eggs, perfect.
Tons of humor and very good gameplay. Love it.

Jogo magnífico,

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, ótimos gráficos (não é pesado, me parece que o jogo usa a mesma enguine de Half Life 2), ótima ambientação e jogabilidade (movimentos fáceis e bem fluidos), a trilha sonora é apenas boa (sendo que fica mais interessante durante alguns eventos do jogo), a estória é ótima e final do jogo me surpreendeu bastante. O jogo é fácil, ficando realmente difícil apenas nas últimas fases. Certamente o jogo vai render algumas horas de boa diversão. Recomendo, pode comprar sem medo.

This game is trully amazing.
I was not expecting that I would have so much fun playing it, and it has more content then the first portal.
I really recomend everyone that likes puzzle game to buy this one.
It took some time for me to finish this game but  it was totally worth it, and besides you even have multiplayer mode which allows you to enjoy it as much as you want.
Is quite fun! That's all I can think of.
10/10 would play again

Очень интересная, но короткая игра. Сюжет на высоте, хоть и очень банален. А музыка, музыка просто класс. 10\10.
З.Ы. Десятку ставлю только из за концовки.
З.З.Ы. Концовка реально ахрененная. А музыка... Это гениально.
un juego para pasrtelo bien y romperte la cabeza.

It may be short but its perfection.

Portal 2 is a Game that must be played At least Once from the Gameplay to the story to the witty sarcastic dark sense of  humour and beautiful environments with the addition of a hilarious fun co op and an endless sea of custom levels thanks to the Steam workshop 

10/10 buy it

Seriously one of the best games of all time. Very accessible for those who haven't played an fps before a lot of phone playing co-op with a close friend or significant other. The story is very captivating and funny with an amazing payoff at the end. Although the original Portal is a little less accessible (less forgiving on getting yourself and items through portals and such) it is also an amazing game and should be played first if you want to have the full narrative of the Portal series. The music video for The National - Exile, Vilify is a good bridge between the two games if you haven't checked it out. Don't think it will happen but would love a Portal 3 :)
Perdersi in un sogno...fantastico!
Definitely one of the best games I have ever played.

Hra ma aj po rokoch grafiku, ktora je na urovni a co viac, pacila sa mi. Hlavolamy boli vynikajuce. Obcasne zaseknutie, ale nic co by som odlozil na druhy den. Viac ma stipali oci z hladania kadial ist ako riesit samotny hlavolam aj ked... Soundrack fantasticky vratane zaujimavej zaverecnej piesne. Videa v hre, dabing a vsetka ta omacka v hre je nezabudnutelna vratane zaverecnej sceny. Multiplayer zabavny, ale ten som este nepresiel len par casti, avsak vo dvoch je o dost vacsia zabava a nepamatam kedy ma hra tak dokonale v niektorych momentoch rozosmiala. Vyslovene prikladna hra ked si da niekto zalezat. Aj po rokoch odkedy vysla odporucam vsetkymi desiatimi. 100%

Отличная игра для тех кто хочет подумать над головоломками. Множество карт с интересными задачами и хорошим сюжетом.
Минусы:
1.пройти можно за сутки
2.можно очень быстро устать
Плюсы:
1.довольно интересные карты
2.очень увлекательный мультиплеер
Итог:
игра стоит того что бы в нее поиграть и хорошенько подумать.
Игра очень прикольна для любителя головоломок особено посмеятся графика хороша и кто её не взял возмите 100/10 ставлю

No puede faltar este juegazo en tu biblioteca de Steam, más largo y divertido que el primero y con horas y horas extra de diversión gracias a los mapas de la comunidad tanto para un jugador como en coop.

Portal 2 è un gioco molto bello, lo consiglio ai giocatori che si voglion fermare un attimo a riflettere, non è uno sparatutto frenetico bensì un gioco di tempismo (ogni tanto) e di perspicacità. Bisogna riuscire a finire determinati test con una strana arma. La co-op è ben strutturata, l'unica pecca è che una volta finite le mappe co-op e la campagna non c'è piu molto da fare apparte la personalizzazione del personaggio INUTILE..
Мне кажется это одна из лучших как одиночных, так и сетевых игр.

Portal 2 es un juego en el que deberás usar todo tu ingenio y astucia para resolver los diversos puzles que se plantean y que van ascendiendo en dificultad con forme avanza la trama de la historia, mucho mejor hecha y llevada que la de la primera entrega de la saga. 
En este juego encontraremos retos más complejos y personajes con mucha más personalidad y realismo.
Un juego que no puede faltar en una biblioteca de Steam

Ottimo gioco che mi ha divertito sia dal punto di vista del gameplay, che richiede a volte di sfruttare l'ingegno, e per il fattore doppiaggio/dialoghi che ho trovato veramente ottimo. A chi lo termina non dimenticate di scaricare il seguito (gratuito) "Thinking with time machine".
C'est l'un de m'est jeux préférer, un peux dificile mais avec un peux d'entrainement il est vraiment trés agréable a jouer !
the best puzzle gamess

Pooooooooorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrtalll 2!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Buy it.

Like skyrim but with an asshole following you that never listens to you and shoots his goddamn portals wherever his autistic animal impulses tell him to. 

Fuck you Dan

Игруха затягивает прошел компанию с другом прошли совместную игру. 
А потом еще несколько раз переходили и то и другое)

+ После прохождения есть продолжение сюжета. (Карты от других пользователей)
+ Карты от других пользователей где не только продолжение сюжета , но и очень много разнообразных карт где можно оценить карту данного пользователя.
+А также построить свои карты для других )

Минусов я не нашел.
 10 из 10

Tiene portales 

10/10

This was a triumph. I'm making a review here, huge success. Even though its hard its fuuuun. 
I like this game a lot co-op is hilarious sometimes too :D
Re-reviewing because its seriously one of the best video games ever made and its turning TEN this year.

Lets say that you are trapped on a Testing Chamber trying to escape, suddenly everything on this game became fun, the dialogue, the way GLadOS plays with your mind ( after a feeeew hours gets boring ) Source 2 its not the best Graphic engine of all time but dude, i mean, DUDE, still looks pretty cool. Then the Co-Op gaming is amazing, maybe a little bit difficult. Afterwords, chamber Creator, Portal 2, CoOp, such as one of the best games i ever played. 9/10
A dir poco fantastico, ha superato ogni mia aspettativa e mi va piacendo sempre di più! Lo consiglio a tutti!

Single player is awesome, but coop-mode is far beyond this. Almost hearing yours and your mate`s brain trying to think REALLY hard is something, that i didn`t experience before. Funny feeling.
Also i should point, that levels are designed so carefully, so no ultrafast or mindblowing actions of players are not required. In other words - when solution is ready, you can do it pretty slowly.
And it`s a big laught :)

Easily one of my favorite games. Even better, one of my favortie campaigns! Great story line, good clean comedy, and great characters. One of the characters even got an award for being on of the best villians in video games! I've beaten the campaign three times now! The co-op puzzles are good too. Great temawork skills are involved, so only play with a good listener and a good thinker! All in all, as I said before, in my top two favorite games. And I've played a ton of games! I highly recommend this game!
bets logic game on pc :)

Amazing game that is even better than the first one, the story is expanded and has an actual plot, a game that is bound to keep you entertained and interested throughout. Also comes with a great co-op mode to play with friends! One of the best games that I have ever played.
Well worth the money, especially at a bargain price with daily discounts.
Would absolutely recommed this game to most people.
10/10
Muhteşem oyunun muhteşem devamı. Kesinlikle oynanmalı.
Ахуенчик

Das Spiel hat zwar eine äußerst kurze Story von nur 9 Stunden. Dafür hat das Spiel aber eine Singleplayer und eine Koop Story, wo man von manchmal auch unglaublich kniffligen Aufgaben gefesselt wird. Man will gar nicht mehr aufhören dieses Spiel zu spielen. Leider ist dann der Spielspaß sehr schnell zu Ende. Aber der Spaß ist denoch nicht zu Ende, denn nun kann man die Karten von der Community runterladen und spielen oder einfach selber eine Karte machen, damit andere Leute spielen können. Daher von mir eine klare Empfehlung

В самом начале Portal была игрой - экспериментом. Она входила в состав Orange Box и никто и не догадывался, что этот довесок сильно выстрелит. Ну Valve были бы не valve, если бы их продукт оказался проходняком. Первая часть была хорошо прията и Гейб и его команда начали работать над второй. И это была огромная работа над ошибками. Portal 2 уже не довесок к какой либо игре, а самостоялельный проект AAA класса. Было улучшено все от головоломок и графики, до сюжета и главных героев. А какие тут замечетельные главные герои. Теперь можно влюбиться не только в Глэдос, но и Уитли. Игра достойна стоять на полке вместе с другими шедеврами индустрии. Прошел всю одиночную компанию и кооператив вместе с другом. Чего и вам всем советую!
慢工出细活，相比一代有很大提升！剧情长度加长了很多，关卡设计也是一如既往的巧妙
Захватывающая логическая игра с прекрасной графикой , звуком и мельчайшей прорисовкой .Если вы еще думаете брать или нет ,то однозначно берите!!! 10/10
Not as good as Portal, but still holds up quite well.
The most in-depth storyline in any game I've ever seen. The puzzles are hard, and it's the best Valve game ever.
BEST GAME EVAR
Greatest puzzle game ever created.

I bought this game whilst it was on sale after seeing a few of my freinds had this games. This game was enjoyable and the graphics where good. I liked the storyline of Glados and Wheatley. This is a great sequel to Portal and I would reccomend to any and everyone.

One of those games that makes you both laugh and cry (crying from laughter usually). Very nicely done game. Would not mind seeing a sequel to this game regarding what happens at the end of the game.

Some of the puzzles can be a bit difficult but otherwise, the game is really fun and has you thinking to complete some stages or get some achievements (Smash TV and Professor Portal anyone?)

The Co-Op game play is challenging in its own right since the difficulty of puzzles lays less with how hard a puzzle is and more with how your friend plays the game with you. Either way, leads to tons of hilarity seeing either me or the person I play with make errors from time to time.

Overall, hilariously well done puzzle game.

Extremely fun, revolutionary puzzle game. The campaign itself only takes about 15 hours but there are a lot more community maps. There are thousands to play. If you feel up to it, make a map and post it. Portal 2 is one of the best first person puzzle games out there.
Even more fun than the first one.

What happens when you mix some mind cracking puzzles, a Mind-blowing story, one of the most charismatic characters ever and put into one game?
simple, you get Portal 2.
I've never seen such story like Portal's, it made me play it begging for more every second, this is one of the best (if no the best) puzzle games ever in gaming history, and should be remembered as it for the eternity!
BEST GAME EVER!  This is my favourite game! Amazing story! I really love it!
SPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!
great game but i died alot less from random crap. but i fell one to many times while having fun over all this is a great game
Richtig, richtig gutes Spiel. Viel logisches Denken und Geschick sind gefragt. Vor allem der Multiplayer macht immer wieder Spaß, egal wie oft man ihn spielt. :)

Awesome game. Awesome. Awesome. Awesome.

Aside from the brilliant puzzles the games contain in which you're best to "think with portals" I have found this game to be much more humerous and witty than I expected! I didn't even realise that I'd be following story but when I found myself following one I found that it was very well put together and enjoyable.
Simplement le meilleur jeu solo et coop du monde <3
Concept simple mais tellement excellent. des heures et des heures de jeu en histoire et encore plus avec la communauté.
Maybe the best puzzle game you will ever play. :D
One of the few games that will never get old no matter how many times you beat it. There's always something new to try out.
Hilarious, a complete and utter work of genius. Brilliantly designed and scripted. An absolute joy to play and probably the first game that actually made me belly laugh.

Portal 2 é Simplismente um jogo incrivel, e não falo isso so porque sou fã mais porque é uma serie incrivel, graficos revolucionaris (comparados com o Primeiro Portal), História epica, A Dublagem dos personagens é sensacional, Um Jogo Muito Bom e Recomendo Bastante jogo pra quem gosta de desafios e jogos de puzzles e eu não conseguir ver algo ruim no jogo pq ele muito bem produzido.

PS : Estou Esperando Lançar Logo o Portal 3,oq acontece com Chell e a GLaDOS e Com O Wheatley ? Bem eu espero logo Saber oq acoteceu com eles.
leuk spel om alleen te spelen best ingewikkeld en mooie gameplay. Kan ook multiplayer zowel online als splitscreen super leuk.
If you want to make use of your brain you should buy this game.
The cake is not a lie!

[b]+ Innovative Spielmechanik und Story[/b]
Portal 2 ist eine Liebeserklärung an die Wissenschaft. Das Spiel versucht durch kontinuierliches Testen die Menschheit, bzw. Aperture Science, zum Durchbruch auf mehreren multidimensionalen Metaebenen zu verhelfen. Nach einer intensiven Recherche im weltweiten [url=http://de.valve.wikia.com/wiki/Aperture_Laboratories]Computerverbundsystem[/url] befand der Praktikant, der diesen Text verfasst hat, die folgenden drei Metaebenen für besonders erwähnenswert:
[olist]
    [*]Metaebene: Das "Heimlich Konter-Manöver" - Eine sichere Technik um das lebensrettende "Heimlich Manöver" zu unterbrechen.
    [*]Metaebene: Die "Nimm-einen-Wunsch Stiftung" - Eine gemeinnützige Organisation, die die Wünsche der Eltern todkranker Kinder erwirbt und an wunschlose, aber gesunde Erwachsene neu verteilt.
    [*]Metaebene: Irgendwas von die Struktur des Universums einreißen ... Das würde ... Also, es würde irgendwie wie, er meint keine Ahnung zu haben, irgendetwas das bei den Duschvorhängen helfen würde, meint er zu glauben. Er habe diese Idee nicht ausgearbeitet, genauso wie die mit dem Wunschnehmen.
[/olist]
Ganz nebenbei lernt man mit dem "Aperture Science Handheld (Dual) Portal Device" wie ein Profi (also wie Chell) umzugehen und bekommt eine kostenlose Salzminenbesichtigung in Upper Michigan. Und Krebs. Der wird aber wieder geheilt.

[b]+ Charaktere[/b]
Man spielt ein Mädchen! Uähhh ... Jedoch stehen die beiden künstliche Intelligenzen GLaDOS (Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System) und Wheatley (Weizenfeld) stets mit Rat und Tat zur Seite um einem aus jeder noch so misslichen Lage zu helfen. Der "Gewichtete Begleiterkubus", die Turrets sowie der freundliche Mr. Cave Johnson sind, last but not least, auch mit von der Partie.

[b]+ Coop-Modus und Workshop[/b]
Der Coop-Modus bringt Spaß zu zweit, der Workshop bringt viel Content.

[b]Fazit: 10/10[/b]
Geniales Spiel. Hoffentlich kommt bald ein dritter Teil.

Отличное продолжение первой части! Сюжет длиннее, загадки разнообразнее, сюжетные повороты на месте, эпичность присутствует. Путешествие по старой лаборатории Aperture очень погружает в атмосферу вселенной Portal.

Сложность выше чем в первой части.

И вроде сюжет вроде не намекает на продолжение, но очень надеюсь что Portal 3 будет, ведь в индустрии очень не хватает таких увлекательных и развивающих игр.
Awesome game
this game is asam they have uber relilisticness lots of puzzles and an exelent storyline                     ps.near the end of chapter 7 thir is a plot twist
Very smart well thought out game full of intresting puzzles, and an incredible storyline.
笨蛋会抓狂系列

ich als portal einsteiger finde portal 2 sehr interessant, man muss sich bei manchen level´n schon sehr anstrengen und nachdenken wie man weiter kommt und das gefällt mir bei diesen spiel, auch die grafik finde ich im gegensatzt zu portal 1 sehr gut gelungen, die storry ist bis jetzt auch recht gut....ich finde portal 2 ist ein kauf wert

Portal 2?
Co říct? Neskutečný posun od prvního dílu. Nicméně pointa je zachována a "Cake is a Lie". Mnoho nových úrovní a hlavně nových možností.
Portal 2 nám otevírá nové dveře k pochopení příběhu, který je stejně skvělý jako hra samotná. Každý kdo hru dohraje nikdy nezapomene na skvělé hlášky o citrónech. :) 

“When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!”

A hlavně, nesmím opomenout multiplayer. Cooperace je na naprosto jiné urovni než v klasických hrách. Je více intuitivní a hráče dokaže plně zapojit do hry s využitím jeho logického myšlení.

I love this game with all of its puzzles and what even better you can make ur own satges i can be fustrateing but if u do it right u and ur freinds can PLAY ONE IT and the multy player is kind of easy But it gets harder!
Good Game. Nice graphics. Very interesting mods for it 9/10
I like placing 2 portals one close to other and running into them like an idiot
Jogo em primeira pessoa muito "Foda!" que exige um bom raciocinio, quem não gosta é porque não sabe jogar :xx

Raienryuu no Awesome !

.. en serio, es la polla.
Portal 2 is a great game. Must Buy.
Portal takes everything great about the original portal, expands it, and adds a fantasitc storyline.  Everyone should play this game.
its portal, cmon, how long as this been out? its a good game, has a level creator, really well writen storyline, british humor, and did i mention portals?
Genius.
Really good game! Amazing graphics and storyline. Everything from the campaign to co-op is perfect..
JustFan approved!!!
Всегда радовал движок Source, но такого я не ожидал. Игра засосала полностью, готов перепроходит ещё много-много раз

Игра просто супер!
Играю с другом и радуюсь
Интерестные головоломки, шикарный юмор, отличный сюжет и пожалуй это одна из тех игр после прохождения которой ощущаешь себя самым гениальным человеком в мире. Советую к покупке всем.

Segundas partes nunca fueron buenas?

Definitivamente NO xD. Portal 2 es una merecídisima 2ª parte de Portal, que nos dejará con más preguntas a la vez que nos responde otras tantas.
Gráficos excelentes, pero lo más importante una jugabilidad ampliada casi al infinito gracias a los condenados Geles, la Workshop y el modo Cooperativo. 
Argumento, impecable, con algun que otro curioso giro y desternillante como cabría esperar de Valve.
9.5/10

-----------------PROS-------------

Workshop
Modo cooperativo
Argumento que hará que te sumerjas en la historia
Buenas dósis de humor

------------CONTRAS-----------

La batalla final, personalmente me pareció mucho más fácil que la del Portal
PAJAROS! CUIDADO CON LOS PAJAROS!
portal2 超级赞的V社神作，不论是在剧情上，还是在游戏性上。比较上一作，更多了不少“新”科技。PS:主题曲依旧好听。

Игра стоит тех денег, которые запрашивает разработчик! Даже если бы она стоила дороже - это тоже было бы справедливо.
Отличный сюжет, отличный геймплей, который в принципе не сильно изменился, отличная, для того времени, графика, отличная озвучка и отличное музыкальное сопровождение!
Кооперативный режим тоже очень хорошо продуман и проработан. Так же в игре есть встроенный редактор уровней, что тоже довольно интересно и полезно для приятного времяпрепровождения. Есть возможность загружать карты из мастерской стима, что тоже добавляет очко в пользу игре. Скучать после прохождения основного сюжета игры, который, еще раз повторюсь, очень хорош, вы точно не будете.
Советую купить! Игра - супер!
Жми палец вверх если помог определиться ;)
Fun game.

Great game, awesome atmosphere, superb puzzles, amusing dialogue (Stephen Merchant is hilarious), no reason not to buy this classic. I completed this on 360, PS3 and still want to play it again on my PC.
11年刚推出时就玩过，最近赶上75%off，叫上朋友一起买来重温。2代在1代的基础上增加了许多新的机关，游戏的流程大大增长，各种各样优秀的关卡设计令人眼前一亮，苦思过后过关所带来的成就感更是无与伦比，的确称得上近年来的上乘作品。
20 euros? worth it.
Fantastic as the first portal game, Play with a friend to complete complex problems/puzzles

Jogo maravilhoso, não é qualquer pessoa q vai conseguir jogar, pois é um jogo que vc precisa pensar, fazer tentativas, e ter uma boa percepção do cenário, é um jogo envolvente e com jogabilidade boa, 100% aconselhável
